content:
#  Space Technology Centre -- Space Technology Centre 

URL: https://www.ctk.agh.edu.pl/en/
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:07:46

The first-ever selfie taken in orbit by a satellite was captured by HYPE, the smallest Polish satellite! It was built by students from the SatLab AGH Student Research Group in collaboration with the AGH Space Technology Centre.

metadata.title: Space Technology Centre -- Space Technology Centre
